welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Danville, a charming city known for its small-town feel and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Air Terminal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buchanan Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for domestic flights and houses several popular airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to international flights and has customs and immigration facilities for international travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'OAK Free WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to get online.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sacramento Mather Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Executive Airport is reserved for high-end travelers and offers exclusive services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
